dc:title: On Pilgrimage - February 1968
dc:creator: Dorothy Day

dc:description.P: Resists the "January doldrums" and writes about the continuing struggle of California farm workers. Tells of her visit to Sicily and England, giving details of the plane flights and her reasons for preferring planes over buses and ships. Praises the work of mercy of a disabled man. Keyword: nonviolence
